text: Avenches was a district of the Canton of Vaud, Switzerland. The capital was the town of Avenches. As of 2006 it is part of the Broye-Vully District. It contained the following municipalities: * Avenches * Bellerive * Chabrey * Constantine * Cudrefin * Donatyre * Faoug * Montmagny * Mur * Oleyres * Vallamand * Villars-le-Grand Category:Former districts of Vaud
title: Avenches (district)
